meanings.definition: To act or speak on behalf of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: I will represent our class at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer will represent the defendant in court.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to represent its owner in the game of charades.
meanings.sent4: The dove can represent peace in many cultures.
meanings.sent5: The red rose can represent love and passion.

meanings.definition: To depict or portray something in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The artist will represent the landscape in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The movie aims to represent the true story of the war.
meanings.sent3: The child's drawing tried to represent the family dog as a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph can represent a moment frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The statue represents a historical figure from our town.

meanings.definition: To symbolize or stand for something.
meanings.sent1: The flag can represent a country's identity.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, the owl represents wisdom.
meanings.sent3: The missing puzzle piece could represent the mystery of the case.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun can represent the end of a journey.
meanings.sent5: The key may represent unlocking new opportunities.
